visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a spline chart. The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis should display months with labels styled in blue, 12px font size. The y-axis should have a tick amount of 8 with labels styled in green, 14px font size. The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. The chart should use custom colors for the series and have a white background with a legend positioned at the bottom.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis displays months with blue, 12px font size labels, while the y-axis has a tick amount of 8 with green, 14px font size labels. The data series represents monthly average temperatures for a year, named 'Temperature', and uses a custom color '#ff6347'. The chart has a white background and includes a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart for better readability and layout.
